Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Fluffy 6 Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
1 Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
18 Overcoat 7 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
36 Cotton Down 5 When hit by an attack, cotton fluff lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.
54 Static 5 The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
72 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
90 Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
100 Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 02 Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 1 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 18 Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 46 Fog Veil 6 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in thick fog.
Disc 60 Overcoat 7 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Cotton Down 5 When hit by an attack, cotton fluff lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.
Cute Charm 4 Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Drowsy Aura 6 Contact with the Pokémon may put the attacker to sleep.
Flower Fuzz 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Floral Terrain.
Fluffy 6 Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
Friend Guard 2 Reduces damage done to allies.
Fur Coat 9 Halves the damage from physical moves.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Misty Mane 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Misty Terrain.
Normalize 8 All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. Their power is boosted a little.
Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Poison Heal 8 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
Predictable -4 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Rattled 4 Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Static 5 The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
Tangling Hair 6 Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Weak Bones -4 Halves the Pokémon's Defense stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
